<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Noble](/NPCs.aspx?ID=882)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Envied by many and detested by still others, nobles exude confidence and gentility. Gossip and gambling are often nobles' favorite pastimes. Day-to-day life for a noble is often a mixture of business and leisure, and to an onlooker, such a lifestyle can appear to be nothing more than a string of meals, parties, and game halls. However, despite what some might believe, life as a noble is often quite dangerous and requires far more intellect than it would appear—along with a healthy dose of suspicion.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

</column>

**Perception** +11

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +10, [Gambling Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4

**Lip Reader** After years of sticking their nose where it doesn't belong, the noble has learned to read lips from afar, with the effects of the [Read Lips](/Feats.aspx?ID=833) feat.

**Items**
[fashionable fine clothes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=15), loaded dice, [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [silver flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277), signet ring

</column>

<row gap="medium">

**Will** +11 

</row>

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rapier +12 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Noble's Ruse** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The noble [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48). On a success, the noble Strikes the target.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The noble deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
